Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Denmark and England will be held on June 20, 2024, at 18:00 in the Frankfurt Arena.
The stadium gates will open 3 hours before kick-off, and public transport is the most convenient and sustainable option to get to the stadium.
Others: No stadium parking will be available on matchdays, and a paid pre-sale of parking tickets is available at 3 public parking lots within walking distance of the stadium.
